main event: A witness observed one oval-shaped orange object, comparable in size to a basketball, in Gurnie, Illinois on April 8, 1956.
interesting points: The object was observed for a duration of 6-8 minutes., The object had a faded orange color., Only one witness reported the sighting., There was no motion or flight path reported., Various conclusions were made about the object being a balloon, aircraft, or astronomical phenomenon due to insufficient data.
